Kazzit is the most comprehensive online informational resource within the wine community by connecting wineries, vineyards, restaurateurs, collectors, and enthusiasts and to help them share information about their services, products, experiences and consumer needs.Kazzit adds value for both producers and customers alike. For producers, Kazzit provides a professional-looking platform where your winery or vineyard can be easily discovered by actively looking customers. With a variety of service offerings, Kazzit provides simple yet beautiful customer-oriented knowledge management solution for every size business, from boutique local growers to nationwide industry leaders. For buyers, Kazzit matches customers with specific wineries and vineyards via customizable searches based on geography, varietals, and reviews. Customers are presented with producer-generated media including virtual tours, videos, photos, and other information that allows producers to tell their story and present their products to actively searching customers.
Kazzit - Best US Wineries, International Winery Guide
Kazzit - Best US Wineries, International Winery Guide

At Aufarin Advisory Group (AAG), we’ve always liked to think that we’re defined as much by who our customers are as by what we do. As a specialty consulting firm providing expertise in the areas of corporate structure, finance, business development, product management and more, we’ve developed a process of working closely with a diverse range of business types. It is that diversity of experience that has helped to make us the premiere advisory and consulting firm we are today.Since our founding in 2010, AAG has served clients of every imaginable size. We’ve consulted for small startup enterprises and provided similar services on a larger scale to huge corporations. From our offices in the United States and overseas, the members of our expert team have brought their decades of experience and achievements to bear in every project they’ve done. Their success at helping all our clients is evidenced by the awards they’ve won and the satisfied responses of our customers.Sample projects below: Advised and led negotiations with the City of Gwangju, South Korea for the sale and implementation of a $300M post-production and 3D conversion film studio; initiated sales of additional facilities to parties in Singapore and France; and developed relationships with library owners (Warner Brother, MGM, and CBS) for 3D content conversionEstablished trade relations on behalf of client with the governments of Angola, Burkina Faso, Peru, and Mexico through direct negotiations with their ambassadors and other high-level officials Negotiated licensing agreement with Advanced Green Innovation (“AGI”) for developing their sales pipeline. Secured contracts with Wal-Mart, Target, Airgas and Orscheln Industries and led discussions with the Egyptian and Mexican Ministers of Energy regarding the potential use of AGI technology

Originally retained for business development consulting services to aid in avoiding dissolution of the business and later asked to become CEO.Reorganized business structure and revenue models, avoiding collapse of business and resulting in $6M in net revenue during first year of management and $14M in net revenue during year two.Expansion of business model into multiple verticals creating multiple revenue streams which resulted in the strategic sales of the business with unanimous board approval.---VC Dynamics provides internet marketing services to businesses, small-to-large, looking to expand its number one resource, customers. Whether you need more patients, clients, customers, leads, online presence and more.VC Dynamics understands the importance of marketing, but more importantly knows that converting marketing dollars into sales is the key to success. The principals of VC Dynamics has a diverse background as entrepreneurs that gives insight beyond the technology related to internet marketing. We know internet marketing is good but only great when coupled with an effective strategy tied closely to the particular industry operated by its various clients at an affordable price.VC Dynamics achieves this strategy by the use of three distinct categories, search engine saturation, business directory saturation and social saturation.In addition to the background of the principals and a proprietary technology that is above the rest, VC Dynamics achieves the results you want by taking the guess work out of it. Simply put, our solution provides targeted, filtered and qualified leads.We look at your target market, geo, demographics, age, and more. We then create a targeted campaign on this filtered data and deliver qualified leads that want to talk to you not just clicks, visitors or calls. Anyone can give you that but we choose not to as our solution is centralized around you and not us.

MonkeyTek offeed products that are highly functional and never boring. Your possessions say a lot about who you are, and with MonkeyTek accessories you communicate to everyone that you are a modern individual who cares about style as much as function. MonkeyTek produced premium cases, battery backs, and other accessories for your mobile life. Since we create our own products, we are able to customize any large order to your exact needs.In 2013 I sold the MonkeyTek brand to a strategic buyer.

I had the opportunity to work under the direction of Babak Motamedi at VC Dynamics, Inc.  As CEO he was the driving force which catapulted VC Dynamics from an unknown to an industry leader in less than a year.  Mr. Motamedi has a proven track record of explosive sales increase and business acumen.  He turned a business start up into a multi million dollar producing company.  Lead Generation is a fast growing and fast moving industry, which requires expert insight, coupled with drive and determination; Babak brought all of this to VC Dynamics.He is the go-to-guy for forging the right marketing mix and strategy to hedge forward in an ever-changing industry. Babak's candor was vividly noticeable in every aspect of VC Dynamics.  He was truly inspiring and taught all of us not just myself to set the bar higher and how to cut a path through the impossible.  He was the glue that brought it all together.

summary: Babak Motamedi holds more than 18 years of experience in a variety of business fields including International Business Negotiation, Business Consulting, Business Management, Entrepreneurship, Real Estate Development, Capital Acquisition, Project Management, and General Contracting.After being General Manager, he had gained enough experience and skills to become President and CEO for various companies, including a business consulting company and a real estate development firm. He maintained this profession option from 2001 to present day. Babak has not only achieved expert status in his career but also enjoys what he does immensely.Working for so many companies and venturing into multiple fields, Babak Motamedi has experience working in South Korea, China, Hong Kong, Thailand, Argentina, Iceland, and USA. He has managed, supervised, and completed the operational checks on countless projects and business operations, which enhanced his communication, leadership, groupthink, risk mitigation, and many other skills.Being a work-oriented person, Babak hold additional skills in contact law, international banking, startups, corporate structuring, and more. All these skills, including the professional skills he has acquired make him an expert and knowledgeable project and business manager. Babak Motamedi’s style and shade of work is one of dedication, passion, and enthusiasm. He loves a challenge and never backs down from them – in fact, he remains set on finding a solution rather than giving up. He has worked with countless clients, partners, customers, and employers, in multiple countries and has enjoyed great business relationships with all of them, maintained in a professional yet friendly manner. Through his style of work, manner of work, and work ethics based on integrity, dedication, and hard work, he is a positive, professional, and competent person to work with.Babak’s dedication to his commitments, be they personal or professional, reflect his personality.
name: Babak Motamedi
title: Founder, CEO at Kazzit - Where the Wine Grows
